attributes.action: investigate why morpeth council is permitted to descriminate in favour of certain businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: morpeth council has favoured competitors on the A1 and has effectively destroyed the business of mr & mrs ford. Why were we asked where we were from - how is this relevent? We are british!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
